channel.title: NEOPETS.:Whack-A-Ghost!,Attack of the Revenge and more:
channel.description:
if you have or can make a script for any of the following please reply... Carnival of Terror Attack of the Revenge Whack-A-Ghost Defender Trainer Extreme Potato Counter Feed Florg Hubrid's Hero Heist Magma Blaster Trouble at the National Neopian (none that i have tried have worked) Tyrannian Mini Golf (just does all the lvl's hole in 1) Whack-A-Staff-Member.
thank you.

item.title: NEOPETS.:Whack-A-Ghost!,Attack of the Revenge and more:
item.dc:creator: @Knyfer Knyfer
item.description:
@Knyfer wrote:

For feed florg you can change the settings to mouse and hold the mouse in the corners of the screen. True, it isn’t scar, but I find it to be the easiest method, and it’s almost like using scar but simpler.

Hope it helps a little. :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: NEOPETS.:Whack-A-Ghost!,Attack of the Revenge and more:
item.dc:creator: @Arkanor Arkanor
item.description:
@Arkanor wrote:

It takes like 3 seconds. Just run through the game manually. Or, if you’re lazy, make a script to handle the early levels and let IT run through the game, then pause game, edit script with the new number for the new rock, go, etc. That’s how I made my original one.

Read full topic

item.source: NEOPETS.:Whack-A-Ghost!,Attack of the Revenge and more:

item.title: NEOPETS.:Whack-A-Ghost!,Attack of the Revenge and more:
item.dc:creator: @Arkanor Arkanor
item.description:
@Arkanor wrote:

Carnival of Terror <<<<Color change is a BEAST. Also, even pre color change, detecting the clock was hard, so always ran out of time.
Attack of the Revenge <<<Dunno.
Whack-A-Ghost <<<<When you figure out how to simulate numpad keys, let me know.
Defender Trainer <<<<Dunno.
Extreme Potato Counter <<<<Mad props if someone can actually code this. Challenge to you, Pyro.
Feed Florg <<<<Probably doable. Never tried though.
Hubrid’s Hero Heist <<<<Dunno.
Magma Blaster <<<<DEFINATELY doable. I’ve seen a post-color change script already for this, can’t remember who did it though.
Trouble at the National Neopian (none that i have tried have worked) <<<<I posted my abandoned attempt at a fixed version of Squig’s. It’s HARD, man. Damn hard.
Tyrannian Mini Golf (just does all the lvl’s hole in 1) <<<<Dunno.
Whack-A-Staff-Member. <<<<I spent over a month trying to fix this one. Eventually despaired - even if someone DOES get a working version it’ll never be as good as the pre-color change one, which kicked ASS.

Read full topic

item.title: NEOPETS.:Whack-A-Ghost!,Attack of the Revenge and more:
item.dc:creator: @doomsday doomsday
item.description:
@doomsday wrote:

[quote=“sdcit, post:5, topic:2230”]carnival of terror is pretty easy, ive dont it one time, but it only shot the clowns

Whack-A-Ghost

ah… i tried that one, i got to 400 liens and quit…

Magma Blaster, done before, with color change= near impossiple. I ll take a look, but i need to get my pass back

Extreme Potato Counter
Feed Florg
Hubrid’s Hero Heist
Magma Blaster
Trouble at the National Neopian (none that i have tried have worked)
Tyrannian Mini Golf (just does all the lvl’s hole in 1)
Whack-A-Staff-Member.

in order:

  1. EXTREMELY HARD. Since the potatoes, a) change color, B) fly at random pace, may be impossibe

  2. I say impossible, too many colors and stuff[/quote]

if you can find out or tell me(i posted this in help section) how to make scar count each time a color apears at a certain spot(then you divide by 2 and vola)

Read full topic
